price: Saa nkuro a Yεsεee no wͻ εberε a wͻyεε bͻne no, Yεhyεε εberε maa wͻn sεeε no.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِم مَّوۡعِدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-qurā ahlaknāhum lammā ẓalamū wajaʿalnā limahlikihim mawʿidan
